definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Egypt (Pabast, Eb:GS 495, or Per-Bastet, Griffith:Hastings DB iii. 874, ‘House of Bast(et)’ orig. Peái-wbaste acc. to Steind:BAS i. 350, cf. Naville:Bubastis 44, 46, 48, 56, Gk. Bou/bastiv (Herod.), Bou/bastov (Diod. Sic.));—Ez Eze 30:17 LXX Bouba/stou (genit.), mod. Tel-Basṭa, near Zaḳaziḳ, c. 30 miles NNE. fr. Cairo.—Vid. Herod.:ii. 59 f., 67, 137 f., 166 Diod.:xvi. 49, 51 Naville:l. c.; Trans. Vict. Inst. xxiii. 137 ff.
